Subjects: sermons, verse in; death, signs of
_description: The approach of death — six lines in a vernacular sermon

BodHat96.Transcription:
Wan is heyn turniþAnd is breþ stynkyþAnd þe
                    fet coldeþÞan far wel wytFare wel wyf and childAnd weel
                    is þan forȝet
BodHat96.Editions:
Fletcher,  Alan J. 
             “Death Lyrics from Two Fifteenth-Century Sermon Manuscripts.” 
             Notes and Queries
         n.s. 23 [221] (1976): 341-2: 342.
